data.what_is:
Axtria CustomerIQ(tm) is the most advanced NBA driven customer engagement solution for life sciences that formulates effective omnichannel interactions across Life Sciences customers to optimize commercial activity.

Axtria CustomerIQ brings together the power of AI/ML based analytics with business-driven intelligence to significantly improve the interaction between the Life Sciences company and their customers, providing a complete 360deg view of the customer at any time. Axtria CustomerIQ automates and optimizes the efficiency of both sales and marketing channels, to drive higher revenue.
data.product_description: Axtria CustomerIQ operationalizes the marketing insights to move the message to the most appropriate user at the most important time.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Axtria CustomerIQ?
I personally found the most benefit in the scalability. This makes CustomerIQ a good solution for growing companies.

What do you dislike about Axtria CustomerIQ?
The only suggestion I can think to offer is to make the GUI a little more user-friendly.

What problems is Axtria CustomerIQ solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our most notable benefits come from analytics. We were searching for alternatives after the pandemic and this was a great solution for us.

initial_reviews.review_title: Outstanding Cloud Based Customer Centric Marketing Platform
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Axtria CustomerIQ?
Well, Axtria MarketingIQ is one of the excellent tool which has improve our business three time more than average due to its amazing features including, integration with CRM, Marketing automation, Real time data insights, attractive user interface, Ongoing operations management, easy planning for upcoming promotions, investment, ROI evaluation and many more advanced features.

What do you dislike about Axtria CustomerIQ?
It does not have significant drawbacks, but Axtria MarketingIQ have higher pricing as compared to other alternatives, their customer support is also treat clients in unprofessional way or respond very late, lack of regular updates, and sometimes we experienced some glitches while getting real time data analysis.

Recommendations to others considering Axtria CustomerIQ:
For all of the technological geeks and business professionals who are interested to get something new which perform excellent in all features, Axtria MarketingIQ would be highly recommended to all due to its amazing cloud based real time analytics, marketing automation and easy integration with plethora of apps.

What problems is Axtria CustomerIQ solving and how is that benefiting you?
Axtria MarketingIQ has really grow our business with their excellent real time 360 degree view for all operations, including ongoing campaigns, promotions, sales, marketing and rest of all CRM tools are amazing. It does cost you higher than others but their cloud based data integration, real time analytics, and excellent performance will make you a loyal client.
